How to create recipe and post it?
How to download recipe?
How to change my personal information?
# You have to login before post your recipe. # \n\n1. Go to \"My Recipe\" in bottom bar. \n\n3. Click on \"+\" icon in the top bar of \"My Recipe\" page. \n\n4. Now, you can create your recipe and post it!
1. Go to \"Home\" or \"Recipe List\" page. \n\n2. Click on view icon in \"Home\" page OR click on the image in \"Recipe List\" page. \n\n3. Scroll down and click the \"Download\" text. \n\n4. Now, you can see your downloaded recipe in \"My Recipe\".
# You have to login before change your information. # \n\n1. Click on \"Setting\" icon in top bar of every page. \n\n2. Choose \"My Profile\". \n\n3. CLick on the \"Pen\" icon in the top of page. \n\n4. Now, you can change your personal information.
